summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 10.8°C) and outside temperature (down 10.5°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 328 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 216 m), and outside humidity (down 5%) when compared to today.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 425m minimum and 1526m maximum, with an average of 624.6m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 836.0m and 841.0m.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; cold temperatures are forecasted. Also, low humidity will be noticeable and winds should remain light. Drizzle or light rain possible, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and the light is absent. Similar weather conditions should remain.
